p.k: Apple is put in charge of the Dollar Store for the very first time. / Apple tries to survive a weekend alone while taking care of Onion's plant. / Apple needs to acquire a lifetime supply of toilet paper to finish his modern art sculpture. / With their 6 month friend anniversary approaching, Apple has to find a way not to lose his best friend. / Apple and Onion spend a day in Falafel's shoes and use their positive attitude to prove he shouldn't be so grumpy.
